channel.title: Contact on Making Models FAIR
channel.description: Recent content in Contact on Making Models FAIR

item.title: Getting Involved
item.description: How to get started Are you ready to contribute to increasing the findability, accessibility, interoperability, and reproducibility (FAIR) of one or more highly cited and well-known models in the social ecological sciences? Below is a checklist detailing the steps to getting started! Check out the models Identify what you’d like to work on Get set up on GitHub Create or contribute to a GitHub issue Update issue labels Get to work!
